title: Knocked Up by Prince Charming
description:
My kingdom, my rules… but Elle makes me want to break every single one of them.
The first time I see her, I don’t even know her name.All I know is I need to have her.And have her, I do.This girl is royally screwed and begging for more.Who am I to refuse a damsel in distress?It’s what I do.I’m the prince everyone loves to hate, until they get in a room alone with me.So, yeah.  She wants me.That, I expect.What I don’t expect is for her to run away from me.And I certainly don’t expect to chase after her.I’m already in too deep, but I can’t turn back now.I want her, need her, will do anything to have her again.… and that includes breaking the biggest rule of all.In nine short months, this kingdom will have an heir.Knocked Up by Prince Charming is an accidental pregnancy romance featuring a brooding, possessive hero and his feisty heroine.  Grab a cold glass of water… this contemporary Cinderella retelling is about to get hot!
author: Lilian Monroe
